title: Binary Search
statement:
# Binary Search

Implement binary search to find a target in a sorted array.

## Problem Description

Given a sorted array of N distinct integers and a target value T, find the 0-based index of T, or -1 if not found.

## Input Format

First line: two integers N and T
Second line: N sorted space-separated integers

## Output Format

The 0-based index of T, or -1 if not found.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
- -10^9 ≤ elements, T ≤ 10^9
